DataElement.preferredName: Patient Possess Central Nervous System Involvement Or Extramedullary Recurrent Disease Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Assessment Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Have as an attribute, quality, or characteristic._A finding indicating the involvement of the central nervous system by a malignant neoplasm._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Outside of, or unrelated to, any medulla, especially the medulla oblongata._The return of a disease after a period of remission._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._the indicator relating to the results of an assessment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Possess Central Nervous System Involvement Or Extramedullary Recurrent Disease Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Have as an attribute, quality, or characteristic._A finding indicating the involvement of the central nervous system by a malignant neoplasm._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Outside of, or unrelated to, any medulla, especially the medulla oblongata._The return of a disease after a period of remission._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Possess Central Nervous System Involvement Or Extramedullary Recurrent Disease Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Have as an attribute, quality, or characteristic.:A finding indicating the involvement of the central nervous system by a malignant neoplasm.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Outside of, or unrelated to, any medulla, especially the medulla oblongata.:The return of a disease after a period of remission.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Have as an attribute, quality, or characteristic.
A finding indicating the involvement of the central nervous system by a malignant neoplasm.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Outside of, or unrelated to, any medulla, especially the medulla oblongata.
The return of a disease after a period of remission.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
